Field Description: Loan Delivery Method (PPP for first draw; PPS for second draw)

Loan Status Date
- Loan Status Date is  blank when the loan is disbursed but not Paid In Full or Charged Off

Loan Status Description
- Loan Status is replaced by 'Exemption 4' when the loan is disbursed but not Paid in Full or Charged Off
Format:
Exemption 4
Paid in Full
or Charged Off

Existing or more than 2 years old
New Business or 2 years or less
or Unanswered

Field Description: Note: Proceed data is lender reported at origination.  On the PPP application the proceeds fields were check boxes.
Format: its either "Not Stated" or a decimal representing $

Male Owned
Female Owned
or Unanswered

Field Description: Yes' if Business Type = Non-Profit Organization or Non-Profit Childcare Center or 501(c) Non Profit
